item.title: 葡萄牙大停电后放宽从西班牙进口电力的限制
item.description: 葡萄牙将继续放宽对从西班牙进口电力的互联容量限制，上个月两国之间的电力交易因停电而中断。【原文：Portugal will continue to ease limits on the electricity interconnection capacity for imports from Spain after trading between the two countries was halted last month due to a blackout.】

item.title: 据说沙特阿拉伯沙特沙比克公司将探索天然气业务的首次公开募股（IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯化工巨头沙特沙比克公司（Sabic）正在对其天然气业务进行更广泛的运营审查，同时正在探索首次公开募股。【原文：Saudi Arabian chemicals giant Sabic is exploring an initial public offering of its gas business, according to people familiar with the matter, amid a broader operational review.】

item.title: 关系恶化，印度限制从孟加拉国进口部分商品
item.description: 印度对从孟加拉国进口成衣和加工食品实施了限制措施，因为近几个月来这两个邻国之间的关系恶化了。【原文：India imposed curbs on imports of ready-made garments and processed food from Bangladesh, as relations between the two neighbors turned sour in recent months.】

item.title: 加拿大称仍对美国征收大部分关税，反驳牛津报告
item.description: 加拿大财政部长表示，加拿大政府继续对数百亿美元的美国商品征收 25% 的报复性关税，对一家研究公司的报告提出质疑，该报告称加拿大政府已暂停征收绝大部分关税。【原文：Canada’s finance minister said the government kept 25% retaliatory tariffs on tens of billions of dollars in US goods, disputing a report from a research firm that suggested it had paused the vast majority of those levies.】

item.title: 葡萄牙举行三年来第三次大选：看点
item.description: 葡萄牙总理路易斯-黑山（Luis Montenegro）领导的少数派政府在 3 月份的议会信任投票中败北，葡萄牙将于周日举行多年来的第三次大选。【原文：Portugal holds its third election in as many years on Sunday, after Prime Minister Luis Montenegro’s minority government lost a confidence vote in parliament in March.】

item.title: 国家媒体称中国住房销售改革时机尚未成熟
item.description: 据中国住房和城乡建设部管理的媒体《中国房地产报》报道，在全国范围内推行只允许开发商销售已竣工房产的住房市场改革的时机 "并不成熟"。【原文：The timing for a nationwide housing market reform that would only allow developers to sell completed properties is “not mature,” according to China Real Estate Business, an outlet managed by China’s Ministry of Housing and Urban-Rural Development.】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局批准诺瓦克Covid-19疫苗，但有不同寻常的限制条件
item.description: 华盛顿（美联社）— 美国食品和药物管理局（Food and Drug Administration）批准了人们期待已久的 Novavax 公司生产的 COVID-19 疫苗，但对该疫苗做出了不同寻常的限制。【原文：WASHINGTON (AP) — The Food and Drug Administration has issued a long-awaited approval of Novavax’s COVID-19 vaccine but with unusual restrictions.】

item.title: 经过多年贸易谈判，澳大利亚 "准备 "与欧盟达成协议
item.description: 澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴内塞（Anthony Albanese）表示，经过多年的贸易谈判，澳大利亚 "准备与欧盟达成协议"，表达了谨慎乐观的态度。【原文：Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said Australia is “up for a deal” with the European Union, sounding a note of cautious optimism after years of trade negotiations.】

item.title: 超越 Nvidia，亚洲最大科技展上的四件必知之事
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的黄詹森（Jensen Huang）是 2025 年亚洲最大电子产品会议的领军人物，多年来，该会议一直是其公司尖端人工智能芯片和排队购买这些芯片的公司的展示舞台。然而今年，聚光灯很可能会聚焦在另一位更重要的人物身上：美国总统唐纳德-特朗普。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s Jensen Huang headlines the 2025 edition of Asia’s biggest electronics conference, for years a showcase for his company’s cutting-edge AI chips and the companies lining up to buy them. This year, however, the spotlight may well be on another far bigger personality: US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 英国与欧盟在重置峰会前就学生和旅行问题争论不休
item.description: 本周末，英国和欧盟的谈判代表就放宽学生、年轻工人和游客旅行限制的措施争论不休，双方都在为重启充满矛盾的关系而召开的峰会前努力解决政策争议。【原文：British and European Union negotiators wrangled over measures to ease travel for students, young workers and tourists this weekend, as the two sides raced to resolve policy disputes ahead of a summit meant to reset their fraught relationship.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德称欧元走强有悖常理，但有其合理性
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，近期欧元兑美元汇率的上涨是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普反复无常的政策造成的后果，也是欧洲的一个机遇。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said the recent rise of the euro against the dollar is a consequence of US President Donald Trump’s erratic policies and an opportunity for Europe.】

item.title: 特朗普关税暂停期的中点将揭示日益动荡的世界
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对所谓互惠关税的 90 天暂停期已过半，未来一周的报告可能会最全面地解读主要经济体在贸易干扰下的表现。【原文：Reports in the coming week may give the fullest reading to date of how major economies are faring with trade disruptions, halfway through President Donald Trump’s 90-day hiatus on so-called reciprocal tariffs.】

item.title: 新的 CLO 管理者不断涌入市场
item.description: 大量对冲基金和资产管理公司正通过首次推出的工具潜入价值 1.3 万亿美元的 CLO 市场，刺激了对新杠杆贷款的需求，并推高了旧贷款的价格。【原文：A spate of hedge funds and asset managers are diving into the $1.3 trillion CLO market with debut vehicles, fueling demand for new leveraged loans and pushing up prices for older ones.】

item.title: 特朗普政府撤销西南航空排班诉讼案
item.description: 特朗普政府撤销了对美国西南航空公司（Southwest Airlines Co.【原文：The Trump administration dropped a lawsuit against Southwest Airlines Co. that accused the airline of setting unrealistic flight schedules that led to chronic delays.】

item.title: 美国称尚未决定纽约市拥堵定价的下一步措施
item.description: 特朗普政府敦促联邦法官不要阻止政府对纽约的拥堵收费项目采取任何行动，并表示政府实际上还没有采取任何行动。【原文：The Trump administration urged a federal judge to refrain from blocking the government from taking any action against New York’s congestion pricing program, saying it hasn’t actually done anything yet.】

item.title: 特朗普的交易让中国既是敌人又是战利品，信号模糊不清
item.description: 透过近期美国贸易谈判的细节，唐纳德-特朗普的全球经济愿景轮廓开始清晰起来。其矛盾之处也是如此。【原文：Pick through the details of recent US trade negotiations and an outline of Donald Trump’s vision for the global economy starts to come into focus. As do its contradictions.】

item.title: 土耳其在黑海发现价值 300 亿美元的天然气
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安称，土耳其在黑海发现了 750 亿立方米天然气，价值 300 亿美元。【原文：Turkey has discovered 75 billion cubic meters of natural gas worth $30 billion dollars in the Black Sea, according to President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.】

item.title: 创新促进瑞典增长和美国国防
item.description:
瑞典和美国国防部都在经历变革。【原文：

Sweden and the US Defense Department are both undergoing changes.

】

item.title: 关税干扰浮现，前景黯淡影响业绩
item.description: 随着第一季度财报季接近尾声，有一件事已经很清楚了：即使在贸易紧张局势出现缓和迹象，股市大涨的情况下，全球经济的不确定前景也正在取代好于预期的业绩。【原文：One thing is clear as the first-quarter earnings season draws to a close: The uncertain outlook for the global economy is superseding better-than-feared results even as stocks rally on signs of easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯在中美舞蹈中打出特朗普牌
item.description: 富兰克林-D-罗斯福总统与阿卜杜勒-阿齐兹-沙特国王在 1945 年的一次会晤可能只有现代史爱好者才会感兴趣。但本周，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统访问中东，美国和沙特领导人之间那次关键性会晤的图片在新闻和社交媒体上流传开来。【原文：A 1945 meeting between President Franklin D. Roosevelt and King Abdulaziz Al Saud might be regarded as something of interest only to modern-history buffs. But this week, images of that pivotal tête-à-tête between the US and Saudi leaders circulated in news and social media as President Donald Trump visited the Middle East.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：美国和中国的预测因关税停战而改善
item.description: 在美国和中国这两个世界上最大的经济体达成降低彼此关税的临时协议后，经济学家们上调了对两国经济增长的预测。【原文：Economists marked up their forecasts for growth in the US and China after the world’s two-largest economies reached a temporary agreement to reduce tariffs on each other.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔称利率需要 "稳健之手
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）认为，欧洲中央银行在利率举措上应保持谨慎。【原文：The European Central Bank should remain caution on interest-rate moves, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官认为没有证据表明人工智能芯片流入中国
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示对公司的贸易伙伴充满信心，并称没有证据表明其珍贵的半导体产品被转移到中国市场。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang expressed confidence in his company’s trade partners and said there’s no evidence of its prized semiconductors being diverted to the Chinese market.】

item.title: 英国央行预测调整可能引发市场混乱
item.description: 前英格兰银行利率制定者警告说，央行计划对其预测和沟通策略进行调整，这有可能给金融市场带来混乱，并削弱决策者之间的辩论。【原文：Former Bank of England ratesetters are warning that a planned shake-up of the central bank’s forecast and communications strategy risks sowing confusion in financial markets and weakening debate among policymakers.】

item.title: 韩国锦湖轮胎光州工厂火灾导致停产
item.description: 据韩联社报道，周六上午 7:11 左右，锦湖轮胎位于光州的工厂发生火灾，公司被迫停止生产。【原文：A fire broke out at Kumho Tire’s plant in Gwangju at around 7:11am Saturday, forcing the company to halt production, according to Yonhap News Agency.】

item.title: 土耳其雪莱比公司称在印度撤销许可后将与印度合作
item.description: 土耳其公司 Çelebi Aviation 周六表示，在地勤和货物仓库业务因国家安全问题被暂停后，该公司正与印度当局 "充分合作"，并遵守相关规定。【原文：Turkish company Çelebi Aviation said on Saturday it’s “fully cooperating” with Indian authorities and adhering to regulations after its ground handling and cargo warehouse operations were suspended due to national security concerns.】

item.title: AirTrunk 亿万富翁在悉尼皇冠买下第二处房产：SMH
item.description: 据《悉尼先驱晨报》（Sydney Morning Herald）周六报道，澳大利亚数据中心运营商 AirTrunk 的创始人兼首席执行官罗宾-胡达（Robin Khuda）和妻子梅莱娅（Melea）在悉尼皇冠塔（Crown Towers）购买了第二处房产，价格约为 2000 万澳元（1280 万美元）。【原文：Founder and chief executive of Australian data center operator AirTrunk Robin Khuda and his wife Melea bought a second property in Sydney’s Crown Towers for roughly A$20 million ($12.8 million), the Sydney Morning Herald reported Saturday.】

item.title: 印度公司和消费者蔑视巴基斯坦及其盟友
item.description: 南亚邻国之间的冲突加剧后，越来越多的印度商人、公司和消费者正在切断与巴基斯坦及其一些盟国的商业联系。【原文：A growing number of Indian merchants, companies, and consumers are cutting business ties with Pakistan and some of its allies after a heightened conflict between the South Asian neighbors.】

item.title: 卢特尼克建立的 FMX 将开始国债期货交易，打击 CME
item.description: 由美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）创办的一家交易所将于下周开始人们期待已久的美国国债期货交易，这对主导该市场的芝加哥商品交易所集团（CME Group Inc.【原文：An exchange founded by Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick is set to start the long-awaited trading of US Treasury futures next week in a blow to CME Group Inc., which dominates that market.】

item.title: 特斯拉在马斯克薪酬事件后采取行动阻止股东诉讼
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）采取了一项措施，以防止未来出现类似阻碍首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）创纪录薪酬方案的股东诉讼。【原文：Tesla Inc. took a step to prevent future shareholder lawsuits like the one that blocked a record-setting pay package for Chief Executive Officer Elon Musk.】
